scripts.seed:generate: cd scripts && npx tsx seed-d1.ts > seed-d1-output.sql && cd ..
scripts.seed:local: npm run seed:generate && wrangler d1 execute portfoliodb --local --file=./scripts/seed-d1-output.sql
scripts.seed:prod: npm run seed:generate && wrangler d1 execute portfoliodb --remote --file=./scripts/seed-d1-output.sql
scripts.db:setup:local: npm run migrate:local && npm run seed:local
scripts.db:setup:prod: npm run migrate:prod && npm run seed:prod
